# Main

## <span style="font-size:18px"> Adrià Mitjavila Ventura </span> {#title}

### <span style="font-size:11px"> MSc | Bioinformatician at *Institut Josep Carreras* </span> 

<p style="font-size:11px">Biotechnologist with training in Molecular Genetics and Bioinformatics. Interested in omics data analysis to study the mechanisms of gene regulation in mammals. See more about me on [my website](https://amitjavilaventura.github.io).</p>
